Changsha prefecture-level city and capital of Hunan province in south central China

sentences.english: Xiangyin Jianzi is a local rhyme dictionary of the Changsha dialect in the early 20th Century.
sentences.chinese: 《湘音檢字》是一部反映20世紀初長沙方言的韻書。

sentences.english: No. 10, Xinyuan Village, Laodaohe Town, Kaifu District, Changsha City.
sentences.chinese: 長沙市開福區老刀河鎮新源村10號。

sentences.english: I live in eastern part of Changsha City.
sentences.chinese: 我居住在長沙市的東區。

sentences.english: "Carnival of National Day " was staged in Changsha Windows of the World on Sept. 29.
sentences.chinese: 9月29日，遊客在長沙世界之窗參加水果花車巡遊。

sentences.english: Hengyang dialect and Changsha dialect belong to the same sub-xiang-dialects.
sentences.chinese: 衡陽方言與長沙話同屬湘方言的一個次方言。

sentences.english: I’ve choked on the dust of Changsha in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 也曾在烏煙瘴氣的湖南長沙呼不給吸。

sentences.english: Changsha City has decided to build an archaeological site park based on this mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 長沙市已決定建設漢長沙國王陵考古遺址公園。

sentences.english: Changsha City has decided to build an archaeological site park based on this mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 長沙市已決定建設漢長沙國王陵考古遺址公園。

sentences.english: Furong District is located in Changsha, the capital city of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉區位於湖南省省會長沙市。

sentences.english: Changsha, capital of the chief province domain, has reportable power brownouts.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，湖南省會長沙已經限電。

sentences.english: Journal of Changsha Social Work Coll…
sentences.chinese: 長沙民政職業技術學院學報。

sentences.english: After lunch he reposed on the couch.
sentences.chinese: 午飯後他躺在長沙發上休息。

sentences.english: He kissed the countess's hand and Natasha's, and sat down beside the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 他吻吻伯爵夫人和娜塔莎的手，在長沙發旁邊坐下。

sentences.english: Changsha Dingli drives with you to achieve win-win development.
sentences.chinese: 長沙鼎立願與您實現共贏發展。

sentences.english: The household tax system of collecting articles by the nine grades families was reflected in the Wu Bamboo Slips excavated in Zhoumalou, Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 長沙走馬樓出土的吳簡中有戶調分爲九品收物的內容。

sentences.english: He insisted on strengthening the allocation and transportation of coal for power generation to ensure proper power utilization in Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 張劍飛指出，要加強電煤的調運，確保長沙有序用電。
